description: Drinking a cocktail with ingredients such as spinach, papaya, and coconut milk can do wonders for your skin.This drink is a healthy and boozy elixir that will give you the perfect complexion and eyesight. The papain in papaya, plus lutein from spinach, contains all nutrients needed for your skin to glow, while carotenoids help prevent acne when consumed regularly!With the cleaning properties of papain, this cocktail can be considered an anti-acne treatment.
keywords: Papaya Spinach Coconut Rum Cocktail Recipe
How To Papaya Spinach Coconut Rum
name: Papaya Spinach Coconut Rum
recipeIngredient: Wedges of papaya and orange edible flowers to garnish

recipeInstructions.name: In a blender, combine all ingredients until smooth and chilled.
recipeInstructions.text: In a blender, combine all ingredients until smooth and chilled.

recipeInstructions.name: Pour into a serving glass and garnish.
